definition: to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department
to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)
to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research

sentences.english: KUNMING, the capital of Yunnan province, is an affluent city.
sentences.chinese: 昆明，云南省省治都会，一座敷裕之城。

definition: seat of prefectural government (from Tang to Qing times)
seat of the principal county magistrate in imperial China
envoy charge with promoting agriculture (in Han dynasty)
to govern/to have complete control over/to be in command of
capital of 府 prefecture (from Tang to Qing times)/prefectural seat
provisional capital of a country (e.g. in time of war)/secondary capital/alternative capital
